summary:
What you need to know about datetimes: time, datetime, and calendar from
the standard library are a bit messy. Find out what to use where and how
(particularly when you have users in many timezones), and what extra
modules you might want to look into.

Log analysis for web applications: Use iPython, matplotlib, and some
custom functions to slice, dice, and visualise your app through its
logs.
title: Drive-in Double-header: Datetimes and Log analysis
